name: Doomed'n Damned
description: Doomed'n Damned is an action game based on retro/classic platform games from Arcades and 16 bit consoles, but revised to the HD era. The level design, characters, plot and difficulty have a lot of influence from the late 80s and early 90s games. The development and production is by arc-gen, an one man indie game studio.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Ge Force GT 540M DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews.review_text: a competent atempt at caputring the charm of old school games. The art style is interesting as well. Try to find a gaming bundle that has it because $6 is a bit much for this kind of game in all honesty.
